{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xiaomi |model=MiWiFi 3 |revision=A |series=AC1200 |est_release_date=2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628AN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.10.14; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Xiaomi_XXXX,Xiaomi_XXXX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.31.1 |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Xiaomi MiWiFi 3A}} :[http://www.mi.com/miwifi3a/ Product page] (CN)
